author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Last time @hacksmith visited Adam's workshop, we previewed their prototype lightsaber hilt. This year, Bogdan from the Hacksmith team gives Adam an update on that project as well as brings a working piece of their latest build series: Real Life Fallout Power Armor! 

Watch Hacksmith's Power Armor project series: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sfR0yZCDDNA&list=PLbncXbXlaNQeVAUQUvgLDnDCtIYOuHb5E&index=7
Find more of the Hacksmith's videos at https://www.youtube.com/@hacksmith

Shot and edited by Joey Fameli
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

Savage Merchandising: https://adamsavage.com/
About Tested: https://www.tested.com/about
Meet Adam in Person: https://www.
title: Adam Savage Reacts to Hacksmith's Fallout Power Armor!

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
In this live stream, Adam will be answering Tested member questions on ... anything! Note: During live streams, Tested memberships are gifted. In order to be eligible, be sure you're signed into your YouTube account and you've opted to receive gifted memberships! YouTube randomly assigns gifts to people logged in and watching.  Instructions are on this page (https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6304294 -- just scroll to "opt in and get gifted memberships."  Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam questions:
